svg.text: This model illustrates the implementation of an EnergyPlus model that communicates with Ptolemy II through BSD sockets. Input into EnergyPlus is a signal for an EMS actuator of a shading device.
This finite state machine simulates the schedule of a tenant.
This finite state machine simulates the schedule of the heater.
This finite state machine simulates the schedule of the heater.
This finite state machine simulates the schedule of the shades.

property.name: guardExpression
property.value: time > onTime & time < offTime & on == true

svg.text: This finite state machine simulates the schedule of the Door.
